name: Other applicant has approved (other applicant is represented)
body:
Dear ((first name)) ((last name))

Your ((partner))'s solicitor has updated the information in your ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership)). You need to review the updated application by ((date of response)). 

Sign in and review the updated application: ((signin url))

If you approve it then your ((partner))'s solicitor can submit it. 

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: Action required: review your ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership))
